title: ALEX AND THE RING
description: When Alexender Fyfe receives a mysterious email from someone claiming to be his father, his whole life is thrown into turmoil. Alex finds out he was adopted and is invited to meet his father in France.He sets sail on the luxury liner The Nostromo when a terrible storm at sea destroys the ship and leaves him marooned.Together with a young girl named Odyssa and the ships cat, they find themselves on a mysterious island where they must outwit fearful giants, mythical monsters and the evil Hyena Men.When Alex discovers a magical ring, he joins forces with the powerful Djinn, Samsaran and together they begin a quest to find their way home.
author: Jeffrey Afiouni
